name: @janhq/inference-anthropic-extension
description: This extension enables Anthropic chat completion API calls
author: Jan <service@jan.ai>

scripts.build:publish: rimraf *.tgz --glob && yarn build && npm pack && cpx *.tgz ../../pre-install
scripts.sync:core: cd ../.. && yarn build:core && cd extensions && rm yarn.lock &&  cd inference-anthropic-extension && yarn && yarn build:publish
